acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._chainId: Chain ID to get the payout address for

returns._0: The payout address for the specified chain

params._owner: Address that will own the contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._refCode: Ref code of the publisher to check

params._defaultPayout: Default payout address for all chains
Default payout address for all chains
params._refCode: Custom ref code for the publisher

renounceOwnership().details: Overrides OpenZeppelin's renounceOwnership to prevent accidental calls

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params._refCode: ID of the publisher to update
ID of the publisher to update

params._newPayoutAddress: New payout address for the specified chain
params._refCode: refCode of the publisher to update

updatePublisherOwner(string,address).details: Only callable by current publisher owner

params._refCode: ID of the publisher to update

params._newSignerAddress: New signer address (can be address(0) to disable)

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

getPublisherDefaultPayoutAddress(string).notice: Gets the default payout address for a publisher

getPublisherOverridePayout(string,uint25.notice: Gets the chain-specific payout address for a publisher

nextPublisherNonce().notice: Counter for generating unique publisher ref codes

publishers(string).notice: Mapping of publisher ref codes to their information

registerPublisher(string,address,(uint25.notice: Registers a new publisher in the system

registerPublisherCustom(string,address,s.notice: Registers a new publisher in the system with a custom ref code

renounceOwnership().notice: Disabled to prevent accidental ownership renunciation

updateMetadataUrl(string,string).notice: Updates the inventory dimensions URL for a publisher

updatePublisherDefaultPayout(string,addr.notice: Updates the default payout address for a publisher

updatePublisherOverridePayout(string,uin.notice: Updates a chain-specific payout override for a publisher

updatePublisherOwner(string,address).notice: Updates the owner of a publisher
